definition: clear soup containing beaten egg and green leafy vegetable/eggdrop soup
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您來點什麼湯？我們有番茄蛋花湯，酸辣湯。

sentences.english: My favourite food is tomato soup with eggs.
sentences.chinese: 番茄蛋花湯是我的最愛。

sentences.english: How about having egg drop soup?
sentences.chinese: 我們煮個蛋花湯好不好？

sentences.english: We have Tomato egg flower soup, It tastes delicious.
sentences.chinese: 您二位可以試一試西紅柿蛋花湯，味道挺不錯的。

sentences.english: Then give me a large one and an egg drop soup.
sentences.chinese: 然後給我一份大的和一份蛋花湯。

sentences.english: Clara enjoys her egg drop soup served over some toasted bread.
sentences.chinese: 克萊拉喜歡把蛋花湯倒在烤麪包上喫。

sentences.english: Here is the egg drop soup and appetizers to follow.
sentences.chinese: 這是您要的蛋花湯和開胃品。

sentences.english: Here is the egg drop and appetizers to follow.
sentences.chinese: 這是您要的蛋花湯和開胃品。

definition: gimbap (Korean rice roll similar in appearance to sushi)/kimbap
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
